description:
At Python Frederick for July 2019, I presented on the fundamentals of #Git and #GitHub for storing your code safely and sharing it with others. This talk is aimed at beginners with no prior knowledge of Git.

Python Frederick is the Python user group in Frederick, MD. You can learn more about the group at https://www.pythonfrederick.org/.

Want to learn more? You can check out my most popular articles at https://www.mattlayman.com/most-popular/. 

I also have a newsletter where I share articles about #Python, Django, SaaS, and other software topics. Join in at https://www.mattlayman.com/newsletter/.
title: Using Git and GitHub to safely store your code
